text: Ghostbusters: Answer the Call is an American supernatural comedy movie directed by Paul Feig. It is also a female-oriented reboot starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth. It was released in June 2016 to mixed reviews. Its failure resulted in a sequel getting cancelled in favor of Ghostbusters: Afterlife (2021). == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2016 comedy movies Category:2016 fantasy movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:American comedy movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:American ghost movies Category:American monster movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2010s feminist movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Ghostbusters movies Category:Reboot movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Ghostbusters (2016 movie)
